original_text: God said, ‘I am God. I am the God that your father worshipped. Do not be afraid to go to Egypt. Your descendants will be very many so that you become a great nation there.
korean_text: 하나님이 이르시되 나는 하나님이라 네 아버지의 하나님이니 애굽으로 내려가기를 두려워하지 말라 내가 거기서 너로 큰 민족을 이루게 하리라

sentences.original_text: I am the God that your father worshipped
Do not be afraid to go to Egypt
Your descendants will be very many
so that you become a great nation there
